sqlMap.statement: SELECT X.BjobBzwkDstcd AS BJOBBZWKDSTCD , Y.BjobBzwkName AS BJOBBZWKNAME , X.LnkgIPInfoName AS LNKGIPINFONAME , X.LnkgPortInfoName AS LNKGPORTINFONAME, X.TCirtLnkgStusCd AS TCIRTLNKGSTUSCD , X.THISMSGUSEYN AS THISMSGUSEYN , X.SysLnkgDstcd AS SYSLNKGDSTCD , X.OsidInstiDstcd AS OSIDINSTIDSTCD , Z.OsidInstiName AS OSIDINSTINAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ05 X INNER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ02 Y ON X.BjobBzwkDstcd = Y.BjobBzwkDstcd LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ06 Z ON X.OsidInstiDstcd = Z.OsidInstiDstcd AND X.BjobBzwkDstcd = Z.BjobBzwkDstcd WHERE RqstRspnsDstcd = 'R' ORDER BY BjobBzwkDstcd, OsidInstiDstcd
